    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ApplicationRepository
    In-memory repository for InternshipApplication entities.
    ApplicationStatus
    Enumeration of application states throughout the review and acceptance process.
    AuthController
    Controller handling authentication and authorization for all user types.
    AuthController.Role
    User roles enumeration.
    BaseController
    Abstract base class providing shared functionality for all controllers.
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a career center staff member with administrative and oversight responsibilities.
    CareerCenterStaffController
    Controller for managing career center staff operations and administrative functions.
    CareerCenterStaffRepository
    In-memory repository for CareerCenterStaff entities with CSV persistence.
    CompanyRep
    Represents a company representative in the Internship Management System.
    CompanyRep.RepPostingReadPort
    Minimal read-port interface for querying posting counts.
    CompanyRepController
    Controller for managing company representative operations related to internship postings and applications.
    CompanyRepRegistrationController
    Controller for managing company representative registration and account verification.
    CompanyRepRepository
    In-memory repository for CompanyRep entities with approval status tracking and CSV persistence.
    CrudRepository<T,ID>
    Generic repository interface for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.
    DataSaveController
    Controller for managing data persistence operations across all system repositories.
    InMemoryCrudRepository<T,ID>
    Generic in-memory implementation of the CrudRepository interface.
    Internship
    Represents an internship posting with details such as title, description, level, preferred major, application dates, company name, and slot availability.
    InternshipApplication
    Represents a student's application to an internship opportunity.
    InternshipLevel
    Enumeration of internship difficulty levels determining student eligibility.
    InternshipRepository
    In-memory repository for Internship entities with comprehensive query capabilities and CSV persistence.
    InternshipStatus
    Enumeration of internship posting lifecycle states.
    Student
    - Y1–Y2 eligible for BASIC only; Y3–Y4 eligible for BASIC/INTERMEDIATE/ADVANCED.
    Student.AppReadPort
    Minimal read-only application view the domain needs.
    StudentController
    Controller managing student-related operations and use cases.
    StudentRepository
    In-memory repository for Student entities with CSV persistence capabilities.
    User
    Abstract base class for all user types in the Internship Management System.
    WithdrawalRequest
    Represents a student's request to withdraw from an accepted internship placement.
    WithdrawalRequestRepository
    In-memory "table" for WithdrawalRequest.
    WithdrawalRequestStatus
    Enumeration of withdrawal request states in the approval workflow.
